function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced NK cell numbers observed during the acute phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection.","Impact":"Increased risk and severity of SARS-CoV-2 infection.","Mitigation":"Promote forest environments to boost NK cell populations, potentially reducing the risk and severity of SARS-CoV-2 infection.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Population at risk of SARS-CoV-2 infection.","Owner":"Health organizations, environmental agencies, and policymakers."},{"Description":"Forest as a more mentally restorative green space than other green spaces.","Impact":"Higher mental fatigue and stress in environments with less biodiverse vegetation.","Mitigation":"Promote and preserve forest areas to provide mental restoration and reduce stress in built environments.","Technologies":"Conservation and preservation methods, urban planning incorporating forest spaces.","People":"Community members, urban planners, and environmental advocates.","Owner":"Environmental and urban planning authorities."},{"Description":"Forest may be more effective in removing ambient pollutants than other green spaces.","Impact":"Increased air pollution in areas with less forested areas.","Mitigation":"Promote and preserve forested areas to improve air quality and reduce ambient pollutants in built environments.","Technologies":"Air pollution monitoring and management, tree planting and conservation efforts.","People":"Population exposed to air pollution in built environments.","Owner":"Environmental agencies, policymakers, and community organizations."}]}
